name: Papantzin
description:
Made for GMC Jam 10 where the theme was "Foreign" and the handicap was "Must be grayscale with 1 accent colour".

Papantzin is a young woman who loves exploring so much that she ignores her dad's advice and rushes out into the rain despite having a fever.

She quickly collapses and wakes up alone in a field, where a spirit falls from the sky to guide her on a mystical quest to the ocean.
